last_episode_to_air.name: Mission Complete / Reception
last_episode_to_air.overview: Taiyo corners Kawashita, but the Yozakuras' attacks fail. Taiyo tries again. Will it succeed?

name: Mission: Yozakura Family
overview: Taiyo Asano has been on his own ever since his parents died and the only one who seems to care for him is his childhood friend and classmate, Mutsumi Yozakura. But Mutsumi has a secret—she is the head of a family of spies! And on top of that, her brother Kyoichiro is dangerously protective of her! To stop Kyoichiro from killing him, Taiyo and Mutsumi must take the ultimate leap—marriage! Because in the Yozakura family, family cannot kill family.

episodes.name: The Cherry Blossom Ring
episodes.overview: Shy student Taiyo's life is threatened when his vice principal reveals a dark secret.

episodes.name: The Yozakuras' Lifeline
episodes.overview: Taiyo and Mutsumi wed despite Kyoichiro's interference. Bomb threat leads to Taiyo's first mission.

episodes.name: Feelings
episodes.overview: Taiyo's training leads to a hellish life at the Yozakura Mansion, causing anguish for Mutsumi.

episodes.name: Kengo/Shinzo
episodes.overview: Mutsumi catches Kengo's incomplete report, igniting a spy game of tag as she tracks him down...

episodes.name: Interrogation/Date
episodes.overview: Hotokeyama arrests Taiyo and interrogates him about Mutsumi but lacks proof.

episodes.name: Bug
episodes.overview: Obsessed stalker Ayaka transfers to Taiyo's class, and aims to kill her crush after a data leak.

episodes.name: Government Spies
episodes.overview: Nanao eats a bioweapon while undercover; Taiyo joins the hunt, unaware it's to kill Nanao.

episodes.name: The Kuroyuri Party
episodes.overview: Mutsumi's visit to Hinagiku HQ ignites a clash between Rin and Kyoichiro.

episodes.name: The Flower Meaning of Kuroyuri (Black Lily)
episodes.overview: Ex-spy Kurogao kidnaps Deputy Prime Minister for revenge; Taiyo halts livestream to face him.

episodes.name: The Yozakura Family Maid/Affair
episodes.overview: Taiyo and Mutsumi are at a celebration party. Taiyo eyes a box with his dead family's info.

episodes.name: Yozakura Ghost Stories/Spy License
episodes.overview: Futaba faints as she has an intense fear of ghosts and curses. Siblings aid her phobia.

episodes.name: Prison Break Grandpa
episodes.overview: Ban escapes jail, takes Taiyo to club for grandkids' wedding, dodging Kyoichiro's capture attempts.

episodes.name: Tanpopo
episodes.overview: Taiyo uncovers parents' tie to Yozakura. He and Shion probe their fatal end in a deadly library.

episodes.name: Aim for the Suite Room
episodes.overview: Taiyo on a ship battles spies lured by Kyoichiro until a torpedo hits.

episodes.name: Yozakura Blood
episodes.overview: Taiyo investigates Kawashita; drugged Nohmen takes hostages. Shinzo aids, facing tough odds.

episodes.name: Cleaning the Yard
episodes.overview: Yozakura Mansion locks in all; Kyoichiro seeks ring thief; Mutsumi aids Taiyo.

episodes.name: Nanao’s Medicine
episodes.overview: Nanao's mutation needs a vaccine, forcing school exit. Taiyo aids him in preserving his school life.

episodes.name: Yozakura Hot Spring Story
episodes.overview: Yozakura family wins a unique hot spring trip, faces hurdles, then relaxes, but...?!

episodes.name: A Drug Called Tanpopo
episodes.overview: Taiyo sneaks on a train, tracking Tanpopo, seeking Momo, and a complaint sparks suspicion.

episodes.name: Sun Earrings
episodes.overview: Hakuja and Taiyo are in a fierce battle on the train, where she unveils the truth about his parents.

episodes.name: Yozakura Front Lines / The Blooming
episodes.overview: Kyoichiro and Yozakura plan attack on Tanpopo's lair; Taiyo preps with Ban.

episodes.name: Cherry Blossom Viewing Party
episodes.overview: Cherry blossom party lifts spirits before Skeleton Island siege on Tanpopo's plan.

episodes.name: Easterly Wind / Weapon
episodes.overview: Futaba fights Akai; Taiyo's team sneaks in, repels spear with Kurosawa's aid.

episodes.name: Shion & Kengo vs. Chacha & Aonuma
episodes.overview: Shinzo's Blooming wipes out mercenaries. Kawashita flees. Shion and Kengo battle Chacha and Aonuma.

episodes.name: Ai and Mizuki
episodes.overview: Taiyo and Kyoichiro find a video of Nanao attacked by Mizuki, who resents society over her past.

episodes.name: Old Blood
episodes.overview: Kawashita and Taiyo fight over the detonator. Taiyo's power floods Kawashita's mind with memories.

episodes.name: Mission Complete / Reception
episodes.overview: Taiyo corners Kawashita, but the Yozakuras' attacks fail. Taiyo tries again. Will it succeed?
